entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
